headLine: Education & Research
text: We organize research conferences and workshops to widen the awareness of our community on different social, cultural, economic, scientific and academic matters related to Ethiopia and Sweden.

headLine: Entrepreneurship
text: We provide entrepreneurial trainings, mentorship, business contacts and networks for people who aspire to establish their ventures in Sweden in collaboration with different organisations.

headLine: Employment
text: We assist our community members to develop the skills necessary for the Swedish labour market.

headLine: Culture
text: We organize different cultural activities and events to strengthen our friendship and togetherness.

headLine: Community Outreach
text: We organize informative meetings and workshops to provide newcomers with information about the Swedish values and system so that they can fully participate in the economic, social, cultural and civic life in Sweden
We also arrange classes to teach Ethiopian languages for children born in Sweden and those who are interested to know the languages for travel, education and research purposes.

headLine: Gender & Health
text: We also have informative programs focusing on gender and gender equity, gender roles, family health, productivity, sexuality and similar topics in the context of Sweden and Ethiopia.
